Blaine McGregor <blaine35010@gmail.com> Tue, Jul 22, 2025 at 8:14 AM
To: Lisa Morgan <lmorgan@acsk12.net>
Good Morning Lisa,
Hope you've had a great summer break!
I was just able to finish Bennett's registration yesterday. Mrs. Kelly at the BOE had to create a new powerschool login/account for AK & Bennett because Brittany
wouldn't provide the login information. She started the registration process but couldn't finish it because she doesn't live in Alex City & couldn't provide the proper
documentation to complete the registration.
Just wanted to make sure Bennett didn't lose his spot in ATB.
Thanks,
Blaine
256-675-9016
On Fri, Jun 27, 2025 at 1:46 PM Lisa Morgan <lmorgan@acsk12.net> wrote:
[Quoted text hidden]
Lisa Morgan <lmorgan@acsk12.net> Tue, Jul 22, 2025 at 8:18 AM
To: Blaine McGregor <blaine35010@gmail.com>
I was actually noticing yesterday he wasn't registered and I was going to check with our registrar and give you a call today, so no worries! His spot hasn't been
given away! You were just in time. Have a great day!
Thanks!
[Quoted text hidden]
Blaine McGregor <blaine35010@gmail.com> Tue, Jul 22, 2025 at 8:21 AM
To: Lisa Morgan <lmorgan@acsk12.net>
Awesome, thank you so much!
